description: Gym+Coffee is a direct to consumer athleisure brand that inspires people to enrich their lives through building a community around fitness and a healthy lifestyle.
Habi is transforming LatAm’s traditionally opaque and inefficient residential ecosystem by providing liquidity and information to all key stakeholders – customers, brokers, banks and developers.

Havenly is the largest online interior design service and most delightful way to design home spaces, on any budget. Havenly’s network of professional, highly screened and trained interior designers create custom visual designs based on the client’s unique style choices.
Hilab (formerly Hi Technologies) is a point of care diagnostics company in Brazil.
The Holstein Milk Company manufactures premium grade dairy products under the Farm Fresh brand, and aims to reduce the country’s dependence on imported fresh milk.
Hotmart is a content distribution platform in Latin America.
Insider is a growth management platform operating in more than six global offices and offering individualized, cross-channel customer experiences.
Instabug is a platform for mobile developers that help them communicate with their users, collaborate with their teams and build better quality apps.
InstaDeep is an AI company building predictive analytics solutions for enterprise clients, particularly in the biomedical, mobility and transportation spaces.
Interapt is a technology solutions provider of mobile and web application development, process automation, cloud engineering, data science and IT support services.
Isaac is an all-in-one platform that offers schools a suite of services including payments, financial products, software, and communication tools to simplify school management.
JobandTalent (JaT) acts as a unique Workforce as a Service (WaaS) platform that offers both employers and employees all the services they need throughout the entire temporary contract duration.
JumpCloud is redefining the directory services industry by offering a unified IT platform that helps SMEs securely manage and control user access to any resource from any location and device.
Jüsto is a vertically-integrated online grocery platform.

Kargo is a freight logistics marketplace covering the entire Indonesian archipelago. The company enables shippers, transporters, and truckers to connect, transact and track shipments in real-time on a platform, which they can access via the website and mobile app.
Kavak transforms the experience of buying and selling second-hand vehicles in Latin America. In 2020, the company became Mexico’s first tech unicorn.

Kitopi is a managed cloud kitchen platform. It allows restaurants to open delivery-only locations by providing the necessary infrastructure and software with minimal capital expenditures and time as well as taking care of the entire customer experience journey. In 2021, Kitopi became MENA’s third unicorn.
Klar was founded in 2019 to lead the democratization of bank services in Mexico by offering an alternative to traditional credit cards and debit services.
KLog.co is a digital freight-forwarder with offices in Chile, Bolivia, Peru, and Mexico, that seeks to democratize international freight and trade in LatAm.

Kobo360 is a logistics platform that connects cargo owners to truck owners within minutes, handling the entire process from matching to payments, while providing financing, insurance and discounted supplies to truck owners.
